activities: Processing of personal information of the employees, prospective employees, health care and research professionals, clinical research study subjects and vendors/service providers. This information is transferred to Incyte Corporation (“Incyte”) in the United States to be processed for purposes of Incyte’s business operations. This includes processing related to the support and fulfillment of Incyte’s obligations as an employer to its employees including administration of benefits plans; administration and management of its relationships with vendors, suppliers and contractors; research and development of its products; administration and management of its relationships with customers; market research, marketing and sales of its products; health and safety monitoring and management; compliance with regulatory obligations, as well as finance and tax compliance activities.
address: Route 141 & Henry Clay Road, Building E336
